title: EET Tools
subtitle: Select a tool tab to calculate EET, time differences, or points.
resultMissing: No missing System A time found. Make sure the row contains “missing time” or provide a BIB.
diffHelp: Enter finish time-of-day and start time-of-day. Result is the run duration (Finish − Start).
diffError: Please enter valid start and finish times (e.g. 10:07:51.5814).
bulkHelp: Paste multiple lines. Each line may have multiple space-separated columns. The first two columns that look like times will be used to calculate the difference (2nd − 1st).
pointsHelp: Calculates DSV points = race points + race surcharge. Provide discipline F-value, minimum surcharge category and adders, plus results and starter points lists.
useResultsAsStartersLabel: Use results list as starters list
pointsError: Please provide valid inputs and enough rows to compute the surcharge (Sum A/B/C).
footer: Select a tab above to use a tool.
headerSubtitleEet: Paste lines with BIB, System B/manual time (TOD) and System A time (TOD) or “missing time” to calculate the missing System A time.
footerEet: Implements the FIS EET correction from 10 reference racers and the official rounding rules.
headerSubtitleDiff: Calculate the run duration between a finish time-of-day and a start time-of-day (Finish − Start).
headerSubtitleBulk: Paste multiple lines and calculate the difference for the first two time values on each line.
footerBulk: Supports extra columns and comments; uses the first two time tokens per line.
headerSubtitlePoints: Calculate DSV points = race points + race surcharge (Zuschlag).
footerPoints: Race points are rounded to 2 decimals (half-up); surcharges follow Sum A/B/C and minimum + adders.
